member.name: ENCLAVE_CREATE_INFO_SGX
member.summary: Contains architecture-specific information to use to create an enclave when the enclave type is ENCLAVE_TYPE_SGX or ENCLAVE_TYPE_SGX2, which specifies an enclave for one of the Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) architecture extensions.

member.name: ENCLAVE_CREATE_INFO_SGX.Secs
member.summary: The SGX enclave control structure (SECS) to use to create the enclave.
